in-between-cards.$description: This is the spacing between card elements i.e. carousels, event cards

in-between-interactive.$description: This is the spacing between 2 or more interactive elements i.e. button, chips

content-to-button.$description: This is the spacing from the bottom of any content to a main CTA i.e. primary or secondary button

form.$description: This is the spacing between form elements i.e. input fields and check box groups
